info.title: APlus API Documentation
info.description:
# APlus API Documentation

Welcome to the APlus API. This API provides endpoints for:

- **Authentication** - User registration, login, OTP verification
- **Exams** - Browse exams, sections, subjects, and categories
- **Questions** - Search and retrieve questions with answers
- **Lessons** - Learning content and progress tracking
- **Practice Exams** - Practice test sessions
- **Payments** - Subscription and payment processing
- **Leaderboard** - Student rankings and scores

## API Versions

- **v1** - Legacy API (deprecated)
- **v2** - Current stable API (recommended)

## Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>
```

post.summary:
Check Username Availability

Checks if a username is available for registration

Register Student

Registers a new student user

Register Parent

Registers a new parent user

Check User for Login

Checks if the user exists and determines if 2FA or other checks are required before login

Login

Authenticates a user using username and password. 
If 2FA is enabled, returns `requires_2fa: true` instead of a token

Send OTP

Sends an OTP to the user via the specified method (sms, whatsapp, email) for 2FA or Password Reset

Verify OTP

Verifies the OTP code provided by the user.
Can complete 2FA login or verified a password reset token

Reset Password (Find User)

Initiates the password reset process by finding the user and returning available contact methods

Change Password

Changes the user's password using the verified token from OTP verification

get.summary:
Get Current User (Me)

Retrieves the currently authenticated user's profile and devices

put.summary:
Update Profile

Updates the authenticated user's profile information

post.summary:
Logout

Invalidates the current JWT token

get.summary:
Get User Devices

Retrieves a list of devices used by the user

delete.summary:
Revoke Device

Revokes (logs out) a specific device

get.summary:
Get all exams
GET /api/v2/exams

Get exam details with unified structure (without questions)
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}

Get all subjects for an exam
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}/subjects

Get all sections for an exam
GET /api/v2/exams/{exam}/sections

Get all practice exams (models)
GET /api/v2/practice-exams

Get specific practice exam with questions
GET /api/v2/practice-exams/{practiceExam}

Get trending (new) questions
GET /api/v2/questions/trending

Get recent questions
GET /api/v2/questions/recent

Search questions
GET /api/v2/questions/search

Get question details by ID
GET /api/v2/questions/{question}

Get questions by subject
GET /api/v2/subjects/{subject}/questions

Get questions by category
GET /api/v2/categories/{category}/questions
Get all settings, optionally filtered by group
Get all available groups
Get a specific setting by key
Get platform-wide statistics
List students ordered by newest first
Get a single student

delete.summary: Request deletion of a student (requires admin approval)

enum: Deletion request submitted for admin approval

post.summary: Create multiple students from JSON array

get.summary: Get student statistics for charts

enum: Invalid period. Use: week, month, 3months, year

get.summary: Get trending courses ordered by enrollment count

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
